verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> on the <S%G1520>first<s%> [day] of the <S%G4521>week<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4404>early<s%> to the <S%G3419>tomb,<s%> while it was <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G4653>dark,<s%> and <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> [already] <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> from the <S%G3419>tomb.<s%>

And <S%G3767>so<s%> she <S%G5143>ran<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and to the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5368>loved,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "They have <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> out of the <S%G3419>tomb,<s%> and we do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> they have <S%G5087>laid<s%> Him."
<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple,<s%> and they were <S%G2064>going<s%> to the <S%G3419>tomb.<s%>

And the <S%G1417>two<s%> were <S%G5143>running<s%> <S%G3674>together;<s%> and the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G4390>ran<s%> <S%G4390>ahead<s%> <S%G5036>faster<s%> than <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> <S%G4413>first;<s%>
and <S%G3879>stooping<s%> and <S%G3879>looking<s%> in, he <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G3608>linen<s%> <S%G3608>wrappings<s%> <S%G2749>lying<s%> [there;] but he did not <S%G1525>go<s%> in.

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G190>following<s%> him, and <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb;<s%> and he <S%G2334>beheld<s%> the <S%G3608>linen<s%> <S%G3608>wrappings<s%> <S%G2749>lying<s%> [there,]

and the face-cloth, <S%G3739>which<s%> had <S%G1510>been<s%> on His <S%G2776>head,<s%> not <S%G2749>lying<s%> with the <S%G3608>linen<s%> <S%G3608>wrappings,<s%> but <S%G1794>rolled<s%> up in a <S%G5117>place<s%> by <S%G5565>itself.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> who had <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> to the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> and he <S%G3708>saw<s%> and <S%G4100>believed.<s%>
For as <S%G3764>yet<s%> they did not <S%G3609>understand<s%> the <S%G1124>Scripture,<s%> that He <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>
<S%G3767>So<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G848>homes.<s%>

But <S%G3137>Mary<s%> was <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> <S%G2799>weeping;<s%> and <S%G3767>so,<s%> as she <S%G2799>wept,<s%> she <S%G3879>stooped<s%> and <S%G3879>looked<s%> into the <S%G3419>tomb;<s%>

and she <S%G2334>beheld<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> in <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2516>sitting,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> at the <S%G2776>head,<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> at the <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had been <S%G2749>lying.<s%>

And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G1135>"Woman,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> are you <S%G2799>weeping<s%>?" She <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3754>"Because<s%> they have <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> my <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and I do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> they have <S%G5087>laid<s%> Him."

When she had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> she <S%G4762>turned<s%> <S%G3694>around,<s%> and <S%G2334>beheld<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> [there,] and did not <S%G3609>know<s%> that it was <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G1135>"Woman,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> are you <S%G2799>weeping<s%>? <S%G5101>Whom<s%> are you <S%G2212>seeking<s%>?" <S%G1380>Supposing<s%> Him to be the <S%G2780>gardener,<s%> she <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Sir,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you have <S%G941>carried<s%> Him <S%G941>away,<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> me <S%G4226>where<s%> you have <S%G5087>laid<s%> Him, and I will <S%G142>take<s%> Him <S%G142>away.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G3137>"Mary!<s%>" She <S%G4762>turned<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him in <S%G1447>Hebrew,<s%> <S%G4462>"Rabboni!<s%>" <S%G3739>(which<s%> <S%G3004>means,<s%> <S%G1320>Teacher<s%>).

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G3361>"Stop<s%> <S%G681>clinging<s%> to Me, for I have not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G305>ascended<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> but <S%G4198>go<s%> to My <S%G80>brethren,<s%> and <S%G3004>say<s%> to them, 'I <S%G305>ascend<s%> to My <S%G3962>Father<s%> and your <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and My <S%G2316>God<s%> and your <S%G2316>God.<s%>'"

<S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G7000>announcing<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> "I have <S%G3708>seen<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>" and [that] He had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> to her.

When <S%G3767>therefore<s%> it was <S%G3798>evening,<s%> on that <S%G2250>day,<s%> the <S%G1520>first<s%> [day] of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> and when the <S%G2374>doors<s%> were <S%G2808>shut<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were, for <S%G5401>fear<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2476>stood<s%> in their <S%G3319>midst,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1515>"Peace<s%> [be] with you."

And when He had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> He <S%G1166>showed<s%> them <S%G2532>both<s%> His <S%G5495>hands<s%> and His <S%G4125>side.<s%> The <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> when they <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G1515>"Peace<s%> [be] with you; as the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G649>sent<s%> Me, I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3992>send<s%> you."
And when He had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> He <S%G1720>breathed<s%> on them, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2983>"Receive<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.

<S%G302>"If<s%> you <S%G863>forgive<s%> the <S%G266>sins<s%> of <S%G5100>any,<s%> [their sins] have been <S%G863>forgiven<s%> them; <S%G302>if<s%> you <S%G2902>retain<s%> the [sins] of <S%G5100>any,<s%> they have been <S%G2902>retained.<s%>"
But <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1324>Didymus,<s%> was not with them <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came.<s%>

The <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> were <S%G3004>saying<s%> to him, "We have <S%G3708>seen<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord!<s%>" But he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1437>"Unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> I shall <S%G3708>see<s%> in His <S%G5495>hands<s%> the <S%G5179>imprint<s%> of the <S%G2247>nails,<s%> and <S%G906>put<s%> my <S%G1147>finger<s%> into the <S%G5117>place<s%> of the <S%G2247>nails,<s%> and <S%G906>put<s%> my <S%G5495>hand<s%> into His <S%G4125>side,<s%> I will not <S%G4100>believe.<s%>"

And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3638>eight<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G2080>inside,<s%> and <S%G2381>Thomas<s%> with them. <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> the <S%G2374>doors<s%> having been <S%G2808>shut,<s%> and <S%G2476>stood<s%> in their <S%G3319>midst,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1515>"Peace<s%> [be] with you."

<S%G1534>Then<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> <S%G5342>"Reach<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> your <S%G1147>finger,<s%> and <S%G3708>see<s%> My <S%G5495>hands;<s%> and <S%G5342>reach<s%> here your <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G906>put<s%> it into My <S%G4125>side;<s%> and be not <S%G571>unbelieving,<s%> but <S%G4103>believing.<s%>"
<S%G2381>Thomas<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "My <S%G2962>Lord<s%> and my <S%G2316>God!<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3754>"Because<s%> you have <S%G3708>seen<s%> Me, have you <S%G4100>believed<s%>? <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> [are] they who did not <S%G3708>see,<s%> and [yet] <S%G4100>believed.<s%>"

<S%G4183>Many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>performed<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are not <S%G1125>written<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G975>book;<s%>

but <S%G3778>these<s%> have been <S%G1125>written<s%> that you may <S%G4100>believe<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and that <S%G4100>believing<s%> you may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> in His <S%G3686>name.<s%>
